title: Markets Update: Investors Feel “Relief” As Clarity Begins to Form Around US Election
description: Ashok Varadhan, global co-head of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division, on how markets have moved in response to the US election and what investors expect in terms of economic recovery and policy agendas looking ahead.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Ashok Varadhan, global co-head of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division, on how markets have moved in response to the US election and what investors expect in terms of economic recovery and policy agendas looking ahead.
